# f5distributedcloud_policer (Resource)

The `f5distributedcloud_policer` resource manages Policers in F5 Distributed Cloud.

Policers control traffic rate limiting and shaping.

## Example Usage

```hcl
resource "f5distributedcloud_policer" "example" {
  name        = "my-policer"
  namespace   = "my-namespace"
  description = "Example policer for traffic control"
}
```



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String)
- `namespace` (String)

### Optional

- `description` (String)

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
